item.title: An Ideation for Kubernetes-native Kafka Connect
item.description: Table of Contents Standalone or Distributed? Issues with Kafka Connect on Kubernetes A Vision for Kubernetes-native Kafka Connect Kafka Connect, part of the Apache Kafka project, is a development framework and runtime for connectors which either ingest data into Kafka clusters (source connectors) or propagate data from Kafka into external systems (sink connectors). A diverse ecosystem of ready-made connectors has come to life on top of Kafka Connect, which lets you connect all kinds of data stores, APIs, and other systems to Kafka in a no-code approach.
